mapper.select: select date(e.time_stamp) as visit_date, count(distinct e.session_id) as total_visitors, count(distinct case when s.id is not null then e.session_id end) as member_visitors, count(distinct case when s.id is null then e.session_id end) as non_member_visitors from user_event_data e left join session_info s on e.session_id = s.session_id where e.time_stamp >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) group by date(e.time_stamp) order by visit_date asc
select count(distinct session_id) from user_event_data where date(time_stamp) = curdate()
select count(*) from user_event_data where event_type = '회원 가입' and date(time_stamp) >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 week)
select count(distinct s.id) from session_info s join user_event_data e on s.session_id = e.session_id where e.time_stamp >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 month) and s.id is not null
